price: When such people are gathered, they will become their enemies and will reject their worship.
arabic: وَإِذَا حُشِرَ ٱلنَّاسُ كَانُواْ لَهُمۡ أَعۡدَآءٗ وَكَانُواْ بِعِبَادَتِهِمۡ كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
